certificateVerifyProcManagerShowDetailsT: The application encountered an unrecoverable error during the TLS handshake. The certificate returned was for the following domain name:
The certificate pinning received an unexpected certificate for the following domain name:
certificateVerifyProcManagerWarningBypas: 我知道我在做什麼，使用 {brandName} 連線。
certificateVerifyProcManagerWarningTextC:
{brandName} warns you when you’re on a network that does not allow secure connections to {brandName} servers. There could be multiple reasons for this:

• You are behind a corporate firewall that intercepts connections
• You are on a public Wi-Fi network, such as a hotel or airport Wi-Fi, that intercepts connections until you have registered through a captive portal
• Attackers might be trying to steal your information

You should not use {brandName} on this network.
certificateVerifyProcManagerWarningTextP:
{brandName} warns you when you’re on a network that does not allow secure connections to {brandName} servers. There could be multiple reasons for this:

• You are behind a corporate firewall that intercepts connections
• You are on a public Wi-Fi network, such as a hotel or airport Wi-Fi, that intercepts connections until you have registered through a captive portal
• Attackers might be trying to steal your information

You should not use {brandName} on this network, unless you know what you are doing.
proxyPromptHeadline: Proxy認證需要您的帳號密碼
restartLocale: 請重新啟動應用程式以使變更的設定生效。
